articles.title: Delhi Lieutenant Governor To Sue AAP Leaders For Defamation
articles.description: Delhi Lieutenant Governor VK Saxena today said he would take legal action against Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) leaders, including MLAs Atishi and Saurabh Bharadwaj, for "highly defamatory and false" corruption allegations against him.
articles.content:
The Delhi L-G refuted the AAP charge as a "figment of their imagination".

articles.title: April-July fiscal deficit at Rs 3.41 lakh crore; July sees first fiscal surplus since start of pandemic
articles.description: The Centre is targeting a fiscal deficit of Rs 16.61 lakh crore for FY23, or 6.4 percent of GDP.
